concept.title: Users and Roles
concept.shortdesc: The provides several roles and a default user account based on each role. You can change or remove these accounts. You can also create new user accounts.

conbody.p: usersdefault users and rolesrolesfor usersFor increased security, change the passwords for the default accounts. A production deployment of the should integrate with LDAP authentication.
roles define the tasks that a user can perform. When you configure a user, assign it one or more roles. Users can perform any task that their roles allow.

The provides the following roles:
admin Allows you to perform any task within the . The default login for the admin user account is admin / admin.
manager Allows you to manage pipelines. As a manager, you can start and stop pipelines, monitor pipelines, configure and reset alerts, and review snapshots. You cannot configure pipelines or preview data. The default login for the manager user account is manager / manager.
creator Allows you to configure pipelines. As a creator, you can configure pipelines and alerts, preview data, and monitor the pipeline. You cannot review snapshots or reset alerts. The default login for the creator user account is creator / creator.
guest Allows read-only access to the . As a guest, you can view pipeline and alert configuration, view general monitoring and log information. You cannot preview data or review snapshots, or configure pipelines or alerts. The default login for the guest user account is guest / guest.
